titles.title: Foster Care Stabilization Act of 2022
Foster Care Stabilization Act of 2022

A bill to amend IV of the Social Security Act to establish a demonstration grant program to provide emergency relief to foster youth and improve pre-placement services offered by foster care stabilization agencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Foster Care Stabilization Act of 2022
This bill requires the Administration for Children and Families to award demonstration grants to foster care stabilization agencies to improve services for foster youth awaiting placement and for other emergency assistance.
